attributes.action: Add three meters more banner space  to parliament square peace protest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is about adding an extra three meters of protest banner space for the peace protest of Brian Haw.

Which was taken away back in 2006, at a waste of tax payers money. If you could please review this and consider this small addition to Brian Haw's protest, the people's banner protest of messages.

Thank you.

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.
This is a matter for direct communication with Westminster Council.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
